Keys.Name: blockKey
Keys.Description: Block Key: Accepts Mouse/Button input using the string value (Mouse0 - left click mouse | Mouse1 - Right click mouse | Mouse2 - Center click mouse | Ect.

Keys.Name: BlockTimeMod
Keys.Description: Block Time Modifier: Mutiplies your block time by the amount to modify the end time/value.

Keys.Name: BlockCostMod
Keys.Description: Block Cost Modifier: Mutiplies your block fatigue cost by the amount to modify the end time/value.

Keys.Name: ToggleBob
Keys.Description: Toggle Bob: Turns on or off the walking bob animation.

Keys.Name: BucklerMechanics
Keys.Description: Buckler Mechanics: Turns on or off the unique buckler mechanics and associated animation code. Off will default it to the standard shield hold mothod for those who prefer it.

Keys.Name: ClassicAnimations
Keys.Description: Classic Animations: Turn on or off classic animation look. If you feel smooth animations are to out of place, use this.

Keys.Name: AttackPrimerTime
Keys.Description: How long of a delay, in seconds, before you begin a new attack combo once stopping your last combo/attack. During this time window, you can initiate a parry.

Keys.Name: PhysicalWeapons
Keys.Description: Weapons have actual hit arcs and will bounce off physical objects when hit.
